other_tests.findings: Undevelopment of insufficient growth of the iris sphincter and dilator muscles.

other_tests.procedure_name: Magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the brain
other_tests.findings: Periventricular white matter hyperintensities in T2 image and tortuous cortical veins.
Dilatation of internal carotid arteries, stretches of proximal cerebral arteries, and peripheral diffuse stenosis of peripheral arteries.
Identified the c.535C>T, p.(Arg179Cys)(NM_001613.4), heterozygous mutation in the ACTA2 gene.
